channel.title: Stylish Gifts for Men
channel.desc: Treat the men in your life to the perfect gift from our carefully chosen selection of stylish apparel, accessories and more.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion
channel.desc: Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.

channel.title: ORLY Nails
channel.desc: Innovators in natural nailcare, Orly offers contemporary nail colours with on point finishes and textures, creating on-trend shades for salon professionals and many enthusiasts alike.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.
